description:
“I treat you like I would treat this flower . Your most beautiful years are for the wine in my cup, for me to consume, for me to take.”

In order to learn the skills, to take the throne as the strongest in Wulin, and restore his reputation, Bai Tan had to use the sect’s best yao ren who was locked away for several years. He needed the yao ren’s blood for his health and to cure the poison in him. Upon seeing the yao ren’s beauty and disability, he bounded the yao ren to his side, with the intention to train the yao ren into a docile pet. He had not expected the yao ren to have an influential background and to be possessed by a demon. While he, was playing with fire.>
